page.title: 16A TEENAGERS DAY
page.content: Today is a typical Monday. My alarm goes off at 6.00am., I arise at 6.15. I have to wear a school uniform, this is a white blouse & socks, a grey skirt & jumper and a red,grey & black tie. When I am dressed I have breakfast. This is usually a cereal i.e. Shredded Wheat. After breakfast I usually watch a video of a film that was shown the night before or maybe Breakfast TV. At 8.00am the school coach arrives and I depart from Tewin to school. At 8.50 school starts. First we go to our tutor rooms to be registered and then we go into assembly. I have Art for the first 2 lessons and then it is break which I usually spend around the Music Block. After break it is P.E. followed by Science. After these lessons it is time for our dinner break.--continued---
